comment: Dr. Hedeen is so knowledgable in his field. He is polite, funny, and easy going. Lots of group discussion, one group presentation, one short multiple choice take home exam, and 2 papers. The class was a breeze, would love to take another class with him.

During my entire time here at KSU Professor Hedeen has been the only Professor that actually made the class enjoyable. I actually wanted to wake up and go to class even if it was a 8am Maymester. Read in his course and participate and of course do the research and you will be rewarded. GREAT GUY!

I thought the subject was pretty boring in general but he kept my interest most of the time. He just has you write papers but you have a lot of freedom as too topics so you can pick something that interests you. He's easy to talk to but he doesn't respond to emails.
Great professor, very knowledgeable and funny.  You learn a lot about mediation and the simulations help improve skills.  He assigns a few papers, but grades easy.  Take this class!

Class was great.  Very interesting, never boring.  I learned a lot.  He's very knowledgeable on his subject but he's also very approachable if you have a question.  No written tests but you do have to turn in some papers.  Fair grader.

no worries here. fair grader and a great teacher. to do well, you must attend, listen and write. if you can't do the above, don't bother really. material is interesting and he delivers it well. i would recommend him but he is not for everyone. if you like his style enjoy. if not, well your loss
Material is great for people of all majors, and never, ever boring!  Dr. Hedeen is a riot! Don't miss this class!
